what: Target factory for workflowr R markdown reports. — tar_render_workflowr
title: Target factory for workflowr R markdown reports. — tar_render_workflowr
text: Generates list target objects render multiple workflowr R markdown reports.

title: Target factory for workflowr R markdown reports. — tar_render_workflowr
code: tar_render_workflowr(   output_dir = "public",   workflowr_dir = "analysis",   target_prefix = "WFLWR_",   include = NULL,   exclude = NULL,   include_pattern = "\\.Rmd$",   exclude_pattern = "^_",   verbose = FALSE )

title: Target factory for workflowr R markdown reports. — tar_render_workflowr
text: output_dir Directory html report files rendered . default 'public'. workflowr_dir Directory workflowr Rmd files located. default 'analysis'. target_prefix Prefix workflowr target names. include Optional character vector .Rmd files rendered. exclude Optional character vector .Rmd files excluded. include_pattern default, include .Rmd files workflowr_dir. exclude_pattern default, exclude files names prefixed "_". verbose TRUE, prints message listing .Rmd files targets created.

title: Target factory for workflowr R markdown reports. — tar_render_workflowr
text: list target objects format = 'file', one workflowr report.
